channel.title: Please Help!
channel.description: I dont know how to get scripts on scar other then the once that came with scar.It says to go to kaitnieks.com but thats down.Is there any other way i can use a script someone plz help...Thanks

item.title: Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Well, usually the script is either attatched at the bottom of the post ( Marked by a green paperclip ) or the script is located in the post.

If its attatched, then click the link, and choose Open In Scar or whatever. Then save the script in your Scar 2.03/Scripts folder.

If its written in the post, just copy from the first line of code the the last line of code ( Usually the last line of could would be ‘End.’ ) and paste it in a Scar window, and save it in the
Scar 2.03/Scripts folder.

Read full topic

item.title: Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

First you’ll probably need SRL. That can be downloaded here:

http://dakotastorm.sslpowered.com/villu-reborn.com/showthread.php?t=3410

Note, you’ll have to register there.

Next, to find some scripts, look in the SCAR Runescape Scripts Section. Its located 3 boards down from this one.

-Weibs.

Read full topic
